title: Overview
body: This course is an overview of WordBuilder, a free application that helps older struggling readers break down multisyllabic words.

title: Decoding Strategy
body: This course describes a flexible approach used to break down multisyllabic words, how to teach it to your students, and how it is used in WordBuilder.

title: Building and Spelling Multisyllabic Words
body: This course demonstrates how teachers can effectively support students as they move from breaking down a multisyllabic word to building, spelling, and mastering the word in WordBuilder.

title: Boosting WordBuilder Effects
body: This course demonstrates how to get the most out of WordBuilder through word-part manipulation and game-based review.
